title:
During tight budget times, why is New Hanover County proposing to spend $17,500/mo for Email Hosting and $16,500/mo for Sharepoint or website hosting to a company called Genisys?  This is $408,000/year for email and website hosting.  



Is this a new contract or a proposed transition?  If it\'s currently in place, was it put out for bid and how is the increased expenses justified by county staffers?
